DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate impact nasal continuous positive airway pressure ( nCPAP ) treatment liver enzymes patient sleep apnea syndrome nonalcoholic steatohepatitis . Using cross design , evolution liver enzymes evaluate 40 patient consecutive period 6 week , without nCPAP treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Impact nCPAP Treatment Liver Function Patients With Sleep Apnea Syndrome Nonalcoholic Steatohepatitis
DOC.criteria: 18 70 year old Nonalcoholic steatohepatitis proven liver biopsy Sleep apnea syndrome proven polysomnography apneahypopnea index > 10 events/hour Informed consent Psychiatric disorder Other cause liver disease Professional driver
